message: Bob, I have a product that I believe would be of significant value to your business. It has the potential to generate a substantial return on investment for you. While I'm not willing to disclose the specifics just yet, I can assure you that it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you. I'm offering it to you exclusively for $1,200,000. This price allows for a substantial margin of profit for you and ensures a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
